summary: The story of six young Indians who assist an English woman to film a documentary on the freedom fighters from their past, and the events that lead them to relive the long-forgotten saga of freedom.
cast: Aamir Khan|Siddharth|Sharman Joshi|Kunal Kapoor|Atul Kulkarni|Soha Ali Khan|Alice Patten|Madhavan|Waheeda Rehman|Anupam Kher|Kirron Kher|Om Puri|Steven Mackintosh|Lekh Tandon|Cyrus Sahukar|Mohan Agashe|Asif Ali Baig|Abhishek Banerjee|Mukesh Chhabra|Pravishi Das|Chandan Roy Sanyal|Jagdeep Singh|Manmeet Singh|Vijai Singh
director: Director: Rakeysh Omprakash Mehra (as Rakesh Omprakash Mehra)
title: Rang De Basanti
